title: Vitthala Shappath
plot: _Vitthala Shappath_ (qv) is a 2017 film about the love story of a young boy named 'Krishna' who is from a middle class family living in a rural area. _Vitthala Shappath_ (qv) is a promise and commitment. The film is releasing on 15 September 2017. Krishna is a son of his parents but he forgets the main object of life. He enjoys his own way by disobeying the guidelines of his parents who are devotee of Lord Vitthala. Krishna goes on wrong path and result of which he faces a drastic problem and after realizing his mistakes, he overcomes from his bad nature. He started to full fill motive of his father and Naina help him in his work. During the period Krishna and Naina fall in love of each other. At one instance situation came before him is that he has to choose any one out of two things, one is motive of his father and second is Naina's love. What he will choose? Vijay is the hero ?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni

Krishna, the only son of his parents, disobeys his parents' orders and likes to live life on his terms. Soon, he realizes his wrong doing and tries to help his father accomplish his motive. In his pursuit, he helps Naina and the two fall in love with each other. Things go well for Krishna, until in a twist of fate, he finds himself torn between choosing his love for Naina and fulfilling his father's motive.
